title: Is one's mind the collection of one's thoughts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Look for it yourself. You have a mind too, from which the question is originating from, why did this question arise?, is it real, if it is real then what is the source of it. If I tell you, you will start looking with an assumption of yes or no, when you do it yourself, it becomes an experience, and once you have experience all your questions would be answered through experience itself.
Exactly. The mind is the collection of thoughts and thoughts can be of million and million of types. collectively we call it mind.
